title: What we offer to our Clients?
desc: We provide clients with full suite white label event production, including:

list.title: Stable Summit
items: Produced on behalf of Stake Capital Group & Curve Finance
Founders & Leaders from 15+ stablecoins, including Curve, AAVE, Maker, Circle and more.

list.title: Blockchain Oracle Summit
items: Founders & Leaders from 17+ oracle networks, including Tellor, Chronicle, Chainlink and more.

list.title: RaveQuest: A New Merge
items: The official afterparty of DEVCON VI in Bogota, produced on behalf of Quantstamp Inc.
